name: Climb Out Of A Dark Dungeon
name_original: Climb Out Of A Dark Dungeon
description:
Introduction:

This is my first unity game I've ever completed and uploaded to itch. This game was inspired by a tutorial project I completed in game maker, a game called "Lazarus". I'll admit that completing a puzzle platformer in game maker was way easier than unity, especially when all the sprites and animations were provided in the tutorial files. This jam was a blast, feel free to rate my game honestly. It doesn't have the polish that many other games do.

Controls:
Move Character - A and D
Pause - Escape

Source On Github
